remarks: The value of the sequence shifter operation is a function on ` CC ` . ` A ` is ordinarily an integer.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement:
shftfval.1 $e |- F e. _V $.
shftfval $p |- ( A e. CC -> ( F shift A ) = { <. x , y >. | ( x e. CC /\ ( x - A ) F y ) } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
